member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.ConsoleHelper
member.summary: Provides helper methods that extend .

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.ConsoleHelper.ReadKey
member.summary: Obtains the next character or function key pressed by the user. The pressed key is displayed in the console window.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.ConsoleHelper.ReadKey(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Obtains the next character or function key pressed by the user.
member.param: Determines whether to display the pressed key in the console window. True to not display the pressed key; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.ConsoleHelper.ReadKey(System.String)
member.summary: Obtains the next character or function key pressed by the user. The pressed key is displayed in the console window.
member.param: A text to output to the console before reading the key.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.ConsoleHelper.ReadKey(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Obtains the next character or function key pressed by the user.
member.param: A text to output to the console before reading the key.
Determines whether to display the pressed key in the console window. True to not display the pressed key; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.ConsoleHelper.ReadLine
member.summary: Reads the next line of characters.
member.returns: The next line of characters from the input stream.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.ConsoleHelper.ReadLine(System.String)
member.summary: Reads the next line of characters.
member.param: A text to output to the console before reading the line.
member.returns: The next line of characters from the input stream.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Hosting.ConsoleHostBuilder
member.summary: Provides an abstraction to initialize console applications with dependency injection, configuration, logging, etc.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Hosting.ConsoleHostBuilder.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Hosting.IConsoleHost
member.summary: Defines the interface of the console host. The console host provides an abstraction to execute console applications with support for dependency injection, configuration, logging, hosted services, etc.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Hosting.IConsoleHost.Services
member.summary: Gets the program services.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Hosting.IConsoleHost.Start
member.summary: Starts the application.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Hosting.IConsoleHost.StartAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Starts the application.
member.param: The cancellation token, used to abort application start.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. A value indicating whether a was started.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Hosting.IConsoleHost.StopAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Attempts to gracefully stop the application.
member.param: The cancellation token, used to indicate when stop should no longer be graceful.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Hosting.IConsoleHost.StopAsync(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Attempts to gracefully stop the application with the specified timeout.
member.param: The timeout for stopping gracefully. Once expired the host may terminate any remaining active connections.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Hosting.IConsoleHost.WaitForShutdown
member.summary: Blocks the calling thread until shutdown is triggered via Ctrl+C or SIGTERM.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Hosting.IConsoleHost.WaitForShutdownAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Blocks the calling thread until shutdown is triggered via Ctrl+C or SIGTERM or the specified cancellation token.
member.param: The cancellation token, used to trigger shutdown.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Hosting.IConsoleHostBuilder
member.summary: Defines the interface of the console host builder. This builder provides an abstraction to initialize console applications with dependency injection, configuration, logging, hosted services, etc.
member.remarks: This implementation extends with the support for interactive logic with the console.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Hosting.IConsoleHostBuilder.ConfigureHostConfiguration(System.Action{Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationBuilder})
member.summary: Sets up the configuration for the host builder. This is used to initialize to be used during the build process.
member.remarks: This method can be called multiple times (the result is additive).

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Hosting.IConsoleHostBuilder.ConfigureAppConfiguration(System.Action{Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.HostBuilderContext,Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationBuilder})
member.summary: Sets up the configuration for the application.
member.remarks: This method can be called multiple times (the result is additive).

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Hosting.IConsoleHostBuilder.ConfigureAppConfiguration(System.Action{Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationBuilder})
member.summary: Sets up the configuration for the application.
member.remarks: This method can be called multiple times (the result is additive).

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Hosting.IConsoleHostBuilder.ConfigureServices(System.Action{Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.HostBuilderContext,Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection})
member.summary: Configures the services for dependency injection.
member.remarks: This method can be called multiple times (the result is additive).

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Hosting.IConsoleHostBuilder.ConfigureServices(System.Action{Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection})
member.summary: Configures the services for dependency injection.
member.remarks: This method can be called multiple times (the result is additive).

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Hosting.IConsoleHostBuilder.ConfigureLogging(System.Action{Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.HostBuilderContext,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggingBuilder})
member.summary: Configures logging.
member.remarks: This method can be called multiple times (the result is additive).

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Hosting.IConsoleHostBuilder.ConfigureLogging(System.Action{Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggingBuilder})
member.summary: Configures logging.
member.remarks: This method can be called multiple times (the result is additive).

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Hosting.IConsoleHostBuilder.Build
member.summary: Builds and initializes the console host.
member.remarks: This method can only be called once.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Hosting.IConsoleHostBuilder.Build(Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.ConsoleLifetimeOptions)
member.summary: Builds and initializes the console host.
member.remarks: This method can only be called once.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Hosting.IConsoleHostBuilder.Build``1
member.summary: Builds and initializes the console host.
member.typeparam: The type of the console interactive application that should be automatically executed when the application starts.
member.remarks: This method can only be called once.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Hosting.IConsoleHostBuilder.Build``1(Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.ConsoleLifetimeOptions)
member.summary: Builds and initializes the console host.
member.typeparam: The type of the console interactive application that should be automatically executed when the application starts.
member.remarks: This method can only be called once.

member.summary: Runs the application that only completes when the token is triggered or shutdown is triggered.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Hosting.IConsoleInteractiveApplication
member.summary: Defines the interface of a console interactive application. This provides an abstraction to console application that interacts with the user and automatically initialized and executed by when the console application starts.

member.summary: Runs the application.

member.summary: Starts the interactive console application if there was one registered in the host.
member.param: The cancellation token, used to abort application start.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. A value indicating whether the interactive console application was started.
